favourite.article: Lord You know our ways! Every crevice of our heart - Lord, You know. And You know that Your ways are higher than ours. Who can understand Your ways? Lord, lead me in Your way.
Lord from my deepest..deepest part.. You know me! Lord You know how thirsty I am for You.. You know how I really.. really long for You...

I use this as my prayer to ask for the Holy Ghost power to move in my life. Oh Holy Ghost revival comes from Thee. Please Daddy send a revival in my life today because I cannot survive without this Revival.

This is different from the version I grew up on:
Search me, O God, And know my heart today; Try me, O Savior, Know my thoughts, I pray.
See if there be Some wicked way in me; Cleanse me from every sin And set me free.
I praise Thee, Lord, For cleansing me from sin; Fulfill Thy Word, And make me pure within.
Fill me with fire Where once I burned with shame; Grant my desire To magnify Thy Name.
Lord, take my life, And make it wholly Thine; Fill my poor heart With Thy great love divine.
Take all my will, My passion, self and pride; I now surrender, Lord In me abide.
O Holy Ghost, Revival comes from Thee; Send a revival, Start the work in me.
Thy Word declares Thou wilt supply our need; For blessings now, O Lord, I humbly plead.
Search me... You can find it when you pray regularly with two or three!
Amen. Search me O God. Try me and know my thoughts. I love this song.

The current tune playing on this site is not the one I am familiar with.
I am referring to the original tune which was first heard in New Zealand as the "Maori Farewell Song" in 1911, and has since been done by many well known secular artists such as Bing Crosby and Vera Lynn, and many others.
I love this hymn! so precious! YOU KNOW ALL MY WAYS LORD JESUS!!!

I have sung this only at ladies' Bible Studies and family camp for one particular church we attended and loved it from the start! I have been looking for it for a long time! If anyone has a vocal version that I could put on iTunes, please tell me where to find it!! Please, please! As far as singing it on my own in my own devotions, I am not quite sure how it starts, so I need a vocal version to sing along with.

This morning, this song is my prayer to the Lord . Oh Lord, my heart is open, search it... it's your Lord, today and forever. What a sweet relationship we can have when there is nothing between us Lord, AMEN!
This song makes me love the Lord more and more each day.
